citeinfo.title: Digital Geologic Map Database of the Nevada Test Site Area, Nevada

descript.abstract: Forty years of geologic investigations at the Nevada Test Site (NTS)have been digitized. These data include all geologic information that:(1) has been collected, and(2) can be represented on a map within the map borders at the mapscale is included in the map digital coverages.
descript.purpose: These data were collected in support of the Department of Energy (DOE)activities at the NTS. The data were collected to provide both detailedinformation and a regional synthesis of geologic knowledge of the NTS.
descript.supplinf: The following coverages are included with this dataset:>Coverage Type Description>------------------------------------------>geolpoly Polygon Geologic outcrops>geolflts line Fault traces>geolatts Point Bedding attitudes, etc.>geolcald line Caldera boundaries>geollins line Interpreted lineaments>geolmeta line Metamorphic gradientsThese coverages are attributed with numeric values and interpretedinformation. The entity files documented below show the data associatedwith each coverage. /* Procedures_Used The original digital data came from the SCITEX scan used to print thefirst NTS geologic map. More detailed information was compiled fromunpublished digital geologic data at a scale of 1:24,000 and generalizedfor presentation at 1:100,000. Digital data was compiled from aerialphotography annotated with field geologic data. Further data wassupplied from unpublished geologic map information in many forms. /* Revisions This is Revision 3 of this data set. See references for previous revisions. /* Reviews_Applied_to_Data: The geologic data content has been reviewed by geologists of theNational Cooperative Geologic Mapping Program and the data structuresby GIS specialists also of the National Cooperative Geologic MappingProgram. /* Related_Spatial_and_Tabular_Data_Sets: The following coverages are related to the main database and areincluded with the database. Other than the descriptions below, thesedata are not attributed. >Coverage Type Description>--------------------------------->pmtopo line Vectorized scan of the Pahute Mesa 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>pahrtopo line Vectorized scan of the west 7'30" of the Pahranagat Range 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>idnstopo line Vectorized scan of the west 7'30" of the Indian Springs 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>btycult line Vectorized scan of the cultural layer from the Beatty 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>btyhydro line Vectorized scan of the hydrography layer from the Beatty 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>btyhyppr line Vectorized scan of the index contours from the Beatty 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>btyhypsc line Vectorized scan of the secondary contours from the Beatty 1:100,000 topographic sheet.>nts_bdy line Boundary of the Nevada Test Site. /* Other_References_Cited Armstrong, R.L., 1970, Geochronology of Tertiary igneous rocks, easternBasin and Range Province, western Utah, eastern Nevada, and vicinity,U.S.A.: Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta, v. 34, p. 203-232. digtinfo.filedec: The entire directory structure is compressed with "gzip". Data inthe import directory are in "ARC Generate" format. The tabular dataare in a form acceptable to the "TABLES" system in ARC/INFO.
